name: girl who eats rats
description:
(PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING)
Warning for the depiction and discussion of animal death. Please proceed with caution if those triggers apply to you.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

made for the bitsy rat jam.
this game is a sister to blood red tide. if you played that, you might recognize someone from there.
